item.title: 问HN：您如何工具团队？
item.description:
我想要一种简单的方法，能够为与团队的业务相关的工具 / CLIS共享最新的二进制 /分发（即使是非DEVS也可以与他们互动）。显然，我希望我的团队只能访问这一点。 I'm thinking of creating a private Github repo (so only team access) with a shell script inside and a manifest which gets the latest versions of all tools and the installation instructions.But I'd have thought this should be a common problem among companies, and there should be standard ways to distribute binaries / scripts (eg node or python scripts with their dependencies), installing the latest versions, the dependencies, in some isolated environment, and auto-updating /通知用户更新您知道是否有任何现有的开源解决方案？ （至少应兼容MAC / Linux）< / p>
评论url： https://news.ycombinator.com/item./item?id=4444455835 点：1 ＃评论：0
